bill.title: Criminal Procedure - Firearms - Transfer
bill.description: Requiring a State's Attorney to serve a written notice on a certain defendant, defendant's counsel, and the court prior to trial or the acceptance of a guilty plea or the equivalent; requiring a court to inform, verbally or in writing, a defendant convicted of a certain offense that the defendant is prohibited from possessing certain firearms and is ordered to transfer certain firearms in accordance with the Act; authorizing the court to issue a search warrant based on probable cause that certain weapons have not been surrendered; etc.

history.action: Favorable with Amendments Report by Judiciary
Special Order until next session (Delegate Saab) Adopted
Favorable with Amendments Report by Judicial Proceedings
House Refuses to Concur - Senate Amendments
